channel.title: Compiler code
channel.description:
code:
[code]@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :co1 set b=0 set t=7 goto co2 :co2 color %b%%t% :menu cls title The Perfect Compiler version 1.7 echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To Run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler. echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs. echo. echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto c if %c%==C goto c if %c%==r goto r if %c%==R goto r if %c%==color goto color if %c%==Color goto color if %c%==COLOR goto color if %c%==reset goto reset if %c%==Reset goto reset if %c%==RESET goto reset if %c%==e goto e if %c%==E goto e if %c%==* goto er goto er :color cls echo Would you like to change the backround color, change echo the text color, or reset it to default? echo. echo back - Change the backround color. echo text - Change the text color. echo def - Change all colors back to default. echo. echo. set /p color=Option: if %color%==back goto back if %color%==BACK goto back if %color%==text goto text if %color%==TEXT goto text if %color%==def goto co1 if %color%==DEF goto co1 if %color%==* goto er goto er :back cls echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5) goto co2 :text cls echo Please select a color to change the text to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set t=0) if %back%== white (set t=7) if %back%== red (set t=4) if %back%== yellow (set t=6) if %back%== green (set t=2) if %back%== blue (set t=1) if %back%== purple (set t=5) goto co2 :c cls title Compiler goto cjc :c2 if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3) :c3 if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce) :c4 %javac% -cp . *.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause cls goto menu :c5 %javac% -cp . .\src\*.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause move .\src\*.class .\classes\ cls goto menu :ce cls echo You need to have Java files for this Compiler to Compile. pause cls goto menu :r cls title Runserver goto cj :r2 set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls goto r3 :r3 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4) :r4 if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se) :r5 %rjava% pause cls goto menu :r6 set rjava= set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server %rjava% pause cls goto menu :se cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. pause cls goto menu :er cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :e cls exit :cjc if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2) :cjc2 if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3) :cjc3 if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4) :cjc4 if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5) :cjc5 if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6) :cjc6 if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7) :cjc7 if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8) :cjc8 if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9) :cjc9 if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10) :cjc10 if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11) :cjc11 if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12) :cjc12 if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je) :sjc set javac="%pro%_06%jac%" goto c2 :sjc2 set javac="%pro%_07%jac%" goto c2 :sjc3 set javac="%pro%_08%jac%" goto c2 :sjc4 set javac="%pro%_09%jac%" goto c2 :sjc5 set javac="%pro%_10%jac%" goto c2 :sjc6 set javac="%pro2%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc7 set javac="%pro%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc8 set javac="%pro%_01%jac%" goto c2 :sjc9 set javac="%pro%_02%jac%" goto c2 :sjc10 set javac="%pro%_03%jac%" goto c2 :sjc11 set javac="%pro%_04%jac%" goto c2 :sjc12 set javac="%pro%_05%jac%" goto c2 :cj if exist "%pro%_06%jav%" (goto sj) else (goto cj2) :cj2 if exist "%pro%_07%jav%" (goto sj2) else (goto cj3) :cj3 if exist "%pro%_08%jav%" (goto sj3) else (goto cj4) :cj4 if exist "%pro%_09%jav%" (goto sj4) else (goto cj5) :cj5 if exist "%pro%_10%jav%" (goto sj5) else (goto cj6) :cj6 if exist "%pro2%%jav%" (goto sj6) else (goto cj7) :cj7 if exist "%pro%%jav%" (goto sj7) else (goto cj8) :cj8 if exist "%pro%_01%jav%" (goto sj8) else (goto cj9) :cj9 if exist "%pro%_02%jav%" (goto sj9) else (goto cj10) :cj10 if exist "%pro%_03%jav%" (goto sj10) else (goto cj11) :cj11 if exist "%pro%_04%jav%" (goto sj11) else (goto cj12) :cj12 if exist "%pro%_05%jav%" (goto sj12) else (goto je) :sj set java="%pro%_06%jav%" goto r2 :sj2 set java="%pro%_07%jav%" goto r2 :sj3 set java="%pro%_08%jav%" goto r2 :sj4 set java="%pro%_09%jav%" goto r2 :sj5 set java="%pro%_10%jav%" goto r2 :sj6 set java="%pro2%%jav%" goto r2 :sj7 set java="%pro%%jav%" goto r2 :sj8 set java="%pro%_01%jav%" goto r2 :sj9 set java="%pro%_02%jav%" goto r2 :sj10 set java="%pro%_03%jav%" goto r2 :sj11 set java="%pro%_04%jav%" goto r2 :sj12 set java="%pro%_05%jav%" goto r2 :je cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions echo link to download the newest JDK Update. pause cls goto menu :sl cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r5 :sl2 cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r6 :cl cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %javac%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c5 :cl2 cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %javac%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c4 :reset cls echo Resetting the Compiler's Logs... pause del "Compile Logs.txt" echo ----------Compiler Logs---------- >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto menu[/code]
enjoy :D

item.title: Compiler code
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:11, topic:162180”]my compiler

[code]@echo off
title All You Need For A Server

:menu
cls
title menu
echo ---------------
echo - Information -
echo ---------------
echo.
echo type E, e or hit enter anytime you want to go back to the main menu
echo this batch file will allow you to
echo - run your server
echo - compile your server
echo - play silabs client(must have clinet.jar in same file as bat)
echo - make new files
echo - make new commands
echo - give some good sites for RS2 private servers
echo.
echo -------------------------------
echo - Use the following Commands: -
echo -------------------------------
echo.
echo server = Server Menu
echo makefile = Make a new file
echo mc = make command
echo copyright - Copyright info.
echo. exit = exit
echo.

set /p variable=
if %variable%==server goto serverstuff
if %variable%==e goto menu
if %variable%==exit goto exit
if %variable%==mc goto index
if %variable%==copyright goto copyright
if %variable%==makefile goto makefile
if %variable%==c goto compile
if %variable%==exit goto exit
if %variable%==r goto run
if %variable%==E goto menu
if %variable%==runclient goto runsilab
if %variable%==cs goto clientsites
if %variable%==bat goto makebat
if %variable%==class goto makeclass
if %variable%==cfg goto makecfg
if %variable%==java goto makejava
if %variable%==runmopar goto runmopar
if %variable%==rc goto rc

:copyright
cls
title Copy Right
echo.
echo ---------------
echo - Copy Rights -
echo ---------------
echo.
echo © Shamon King/Openice123
echo Wednesday, October, 17 2007 7:43 PM
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
goto menu

:compile
title Compiler
cls
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac” *.java
pause
goto menu

:exit
exit

:run
cls
title runing server
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo - -
echo - starting Server -
echo - -
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
goto menu

:runsilab
cls
@echo off
title silab’s client
@echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
@echo - -
@echo - loading silabs client please wait -
@echo - -
@echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
JAVA -Xmx1024m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
pause
goto menu

:rc
cls
@echo off
title silab’s client
@echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
@echo - -
@echo - loading silabs client please wait -
@echo - -
@echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx512m -jar loader.jar client.zip 0 0 highmem members 0
pause
goto menu

:makefile
cls
title Make a new File
echo.
echo. ------------------
echo - Make a new file-
echo. ------------------
echo make a new file for your server
echo.
echo type in either java, class, bat, or cfg you make that file
echo.
echo java = java file
echo class = class file
echo bat = bat file
echo cfg = cfg file
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==bat goto makebat
if %opt%==class goto makeclass
if %opt%==cfg goto makecfg
if %opt%==java goto makejava
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
pause

:serverstuff
cls
title Server Menu
echo.
echo. ---------------
echo - server stuff-
echo. ---------------
echo Run your server or play on silabs client
echo type in either c, r, or exit
echo.
echo c = compile
echo r = run
echo exit = exit
echo.
echo. ----------
echo - clients-
echo. ----------
echo runclient = run silabs client
echo cs = client sites
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==c goto compile
if %opt%==exit goto exit
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==r goto run
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
if %opt%==runclient goto runsilab
if %opt%==cs goto clientsites
pause

:makeclass
title Class
cls
set /p name=What is the name of the file?
cls
set /p contents=Please enter in the contents of the class source file:
cls
echo %contents% >> %name%.class
echo %name% class file created successfully!
pause
goto menu

:makejava
title Java
cls
set /p name=What is the name of the file?
cls
set /p contents=Please enter in the contents of the java source file:
cls
echo %contents% >> %name%.java
echo %name% java file created successfully!
pause
goto menu

:makebat
title bat
cls
set /p name=What is the name of the file?
cls
set /p contents=Please enter in the contents of the bat source file:
cls
echo %contents% >> %name%.bat
echo %name% bat file created successfully!
pause
goto menu

:makecfg
title cfg
cls
set /p name=What is the name of the file?
cls
set /p contents=Please enter in the contents of the cfg source file:
cls
echo %contents% >> %name%.cfg
echo %name% cfg file created successfully!
pause
goto menu

:clientsites
cls
title sites
echo.
echo client.silabsoft.org
echo http://moparisthebest.com/
echo google
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
pause
goto menu

:index
set voi=commands.txt
set dir=.
if exist .\sources set dir=.\sources
if exist .\Sources set dir=.\Sources
set code=
set code1=
set code2=
set code3=
set code4=
set code5=
set code6=
set code7=
set code8=
set code9=
set code10=
cls
title Command Maker
echo. ------------------
echo - command maker -
echo. ------------------
echo make a new command for your server
echo.
echo. ---------------
echo - How to use: -
echo. ---------------
echo 1 - Type the letter “s” and press “enter”,
echo 2 - Choose a name for your command,
echo 3 - Choose which type of command you would like to create,
echo 4 - Add what you would like your command to do,
echo 5 - Copy your new code from the new commands text file,
echo 6 - Paste your new command into your client.java
echo 7 - type in e and go to the main menu
echo 8 - type c to compile
echo 9 - then type r to run the server
echo.
echo s - Start making the command.
echo e - Got to main menu.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==s goto step1a
if %opt%==S goto step1a
if %opt%==start goto step1a
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
if %opt%==exit goto end
if %opt%==* goto er
goto er
:er
title Command Maker
cls
echo Unrecognized command. Make sure you are spelling
echo the commands correctly.
pause
goto index
:er2
title Command Maker
cls
echo You do not have commands.txt. Would you like to
echo create it now?
echo.
echo.
set /p yn=(Y/N)?
if %yn%==y goto y
if %yn%==Y goto y
if %yn%==yes goto y
if %yn%==Yes goto y
if %yn%==YES goto y
if %yn%==n goto n
if %yn%==N goto n
if %yn%==no goto n
if %yn%==No goto n
if %yn%==NO goto n
if %yn%==* goto er
goto er
:y
echo //made by command maker >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.io.; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.StringTokenizer; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.Calendar; >> %dir%commands.txt
echo import java.util.GregorianCalendar; >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1
:n
cls
echo You can not continue until you have commands.txt.
pause
goto intro
:end
cls
exit
:step1
cls
title Command Maker - Step 1
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
:step1a
cls
title Command Maker - Step 2
set /p name=What is the name of the command?
:step1b
echo Now select which features you would like.
echo a - teleport, additem and sendmessage
echo 1 - teleport and additem
echo 2 - additem and sendmessage
echo 3 - teleport and sendmessage
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==a goto step1g
if %opt3%==A goto step1g
if %opt3%==all goto step1g
if %opt3%==1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==sel1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==SEL1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==sel2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==SEL2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==sel3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==SEL3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%== goto er
:stepsel1
cls
title Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==F goto step1e
if %opt3%==finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==item goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==I goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==tele goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==T goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel2
cls
title Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with additem
echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo i - (first)Adds additem to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==Item goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepall
cls
title Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo m - (third)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto step1d
if %opt3%==Message goto step1d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto step1d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto step1x
if %opt3%==Item goto step1x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto step1x
if %opt3%==t goto step1g
if %opt3%==Tele goto step1g
if %opt3%==TELE goto step1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel3
cls
title Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==Tele goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==TELE goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel1x
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel1f
:step1x
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto step1d

:stepsel2x
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel2d

:stepsel2d
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel2f
:step1d
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto step1f
:step1g
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto step1z
:step1z
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto step1x
:stepsel3d
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel3f
:stepsel3g
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel3z
:stepsel3z
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel3d
:stepsel1g
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel1z
:stepsel1z
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel1x
:step1f
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel3f
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel2f
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel1f
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:step1fa
if %nummess% GEQ 2 goto step1fb
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g

:step1fc
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
:step1g
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo The command was created and added to commands.txt
echo successfully! Where would you like to go now?
echo.
echo i - Takes you to the Index page.
echo e - Exits out of the Generator.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt5=Option:
if %opt5%==i goto index
if %opt5%==Index goto index
if %opt5%==INDEX goto index
if %opt5%==e goto end
if %opt5%==Exit goto end
if %opt5%==EXIT goto end
if %opt5%==* goto er
goto er
[/code][/quote]

He already has our point

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler code
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

my compiler

[code]@echo off
title All You Need For A Server

:menu
cls
title menu
echo ---------------
echo - Information -
echo ---------------
echo.
echo type E, e or hit enter anytime you want to go back to the main menu
echo this batch file will allow you to
echo - run your server
echo - compile your server
echo - play silabs client(must have clinet.jar in same file as bat)
echo - make new files
echo - make new commands
echo - give some good sites for RS2 private servers
echo.
echo -------------------------------
echo - Use the following Commands: -
echo -------------------------------
echo.
echo server = Server Menu
echo makefile = Make a new file
echo mc = make command
echo copyright - Copyright info.
echo. exit = exit
echo.

set /p variable=
if %variable%==server goto serverstuff
if %variable%==e goto menu
if %variable%==exit goto exit
if %variable%==mc goto index
if %variable%==copyright goto copyright
if %variable%==makefile goto makefile
if %variable%==c goto compile
if %variable%==exit goto exit
if %variable%==r goto run
if %variable%==E goto menu
if %variable%==runclient goto runsilab
if %variable%==cs goto clientsites
if %variable%==bat goto makebat
if %variable%==class goto makeclass
if %variable%==cfg goto makecfg
if %variable%==java goto makejava
if %variable%==runmopar goto runmopar
if %variable%==rc goto rc

:copyright
cls
title Copy Right
echo.
echo ---------------
echo - Copy Rights -
echo ---------------
echo.
echo © Shamon King/Openice123
echo Wednesday, October, 17 2007 7:43 PM
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
goto menu

:compile
title Compiler
cls
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac” *.java
pause
goto menu

:exit
exit

:run
cls
title runing server
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo - -
echo - starting Server -
echo - -
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
goto menu

:runsilab
cls
@echo off
title silab’s client
@echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
@echo - -
@echo - loading silabs client please wait -
@echo - -
@echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
JAVA -Xmx1024m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
pause
goto menu

:rc
cls
@echo off
title silab’s client
@echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
@echo - -
@echo - loading silabs client please wait -
@echo - -
@echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx512m -jar loader.jar client.zip 0 0 highmem members 0
pause
goto menu

:makefile
cls
title Make a new File
echo.
echo. ------------------
echo - Make a new file-
echo. ------------------
echo make a new file for your server
echo.
echo type in either java, class, bat, or cfg you make that file
echo.
echo java = java file
echo class = class file
echo bat = bat file
echo cfg = cfg file
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==bat goto makebat
if %opt%==class goto makeclass
if %opt%==cfg goto makecfg
if %opt%==java goto makejava
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
pause

:serverstuff
cls
title Server Menu
echo.
echo. ---------------
echo - server stuff-
echo. ---------------
echo Run your server or play on silabs client
echo type in either c, r, or exit
echo.
echo c = compile
echo r = run
echo exit = exit
echo.
echo. ----------
echo - clients-
echo. ----------
echo runclient = run silabs client
echo cs = client sites
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==c goto compile
if %opt%==exit goto exit
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==r goto run
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
if %opt%==runclient goto runsilab
if %opt%==cs goto clientsites
pause

:makeclass
title Class
cls
set /p name=What is the name of the file?
cls
set /p contents=Please enter in the contents of the class source file:
cls
echo %contents% >> %name%.class
echo %name% class file created successfully!
pause
goto menu

:makejava
title Java
cls
set /p name=What is the name of the file?
cls
set /p contents=Please enter in the contents of the java source file:
cls
echo %contents% >> %name%.java
echo %name% java file created successfully!
pause
goto menu

:makebat
title bat
cls
set /p name=What is the name of the file?
cls
set /p contents=Please enter in the contents of the bat source file:
cls
echo %contents% >> %name%.bat
echo %name% bat file created successfully!
pause
goto menu

:makecfg
title cfg
cls
set /p name=What is the name of the file?
cls
set /p contents=Please enter in the contents of the cfg source file:
cls
echo %contents% >> %name%.cfg
echo %name% cfg file created successfully!
pause
goto menu

:clientsites
cls
title sites
echo.
echo client.silabsoft.org
echo http://moparisthebest.com/
echo rune-server.org
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
pause
goto menu

:index
set voi=commands.txt
set dir=.
if exist .\sources set dir=.\sources
if exist .\Sources set dir=.\Sources
set code=
set code1=
set code2=
set code3=
set code4=
set code5=
set code6=
set code7=
set code8=
set code9=
set code10=
cls
title Command Maker
echo. ------------------
echo - command maker -
echo. ------------------
echo make a new command for your server
echo.
echo. ---------------
echo - How to use: -
echo. ---------------
echo 1 - Type the letter “s” and press “enter”,
echo 2 - Choose a name for your command,
echo 3 - Choose which type of command you would like to create,
echo 4 - Add what you would like your command to do,
echo 5 - Copy your new code from the new commands text file,
echo 6 - Paste your new command into your client.java
echo 7 - type in e and go to the main menu
echo 8 - type c to compile
echo 9 - then type r to run the server
echo.
echo s - Start making the command.
echo e - Got to main menu.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==s goto step1a
if %opt%==S goto step1a
if %opt%==start goto step1a
if %opt%==e goto menu
if %opt%==E goto menu
if %opt%==exit goto end
if %opt%==* goto er
goto er
:er
title Command Maker
cls
echo Unrecognized command. Make sure you are spelling
echo the commands correctly.
pause
goto index
:er2
title Command Maker
cls
echo You do not have commands.txt. Would you like to
echo create it now?
echo.
echo.
set /p yn=(Y/N)?
if %yn%==y goto y
if %yn%==Y goto y
if %yn%==yes goto y
if %yn%==Yes goto y
if %yn%==YES goto y
if %yn%==n goto n
if %yn%==N goto n
if %yn%==no goto n
if %yn%==No goto n
if %yn%==NO goto n
if %yn%==* goto er
goto er
:y
echo //made by command maker >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.io.; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.StringTokenizer; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.Calendar; >> %dir%commands.txt
echo import java.util.GregorianCalendar; >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1
:n
cls
echo You can not continue until you have commands.txt.
pause
goto intro
:end
cls
exit
:step1
cls
title Command Maker - Step 1
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
:step1a
cls
title Command Maker - Step 2
set /p name=What is the name of the command?
:step1b
echo Now select which features you would like.
echo a - teleport, additem and sendmessage
echo 1 - teleport and additem
echo 2 - additem and sendmessage
echo 3 - teleport and sendmessage
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==a goto step1g
if %opt3%==A goto step1g
if %opt3%==all goto step1g
if %opt3%==1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==sel1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==SEL1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==sel2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==SEL2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==sel3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==SEL3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%== goto er
:stepsel1
cls
title Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==F goto step1e
if %opt3%==finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==item goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==I goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==tele goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==T goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel2
cls
title Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with additem
echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo i - (first)Adds additem to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==Item goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepall
cls
title Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo m - (third)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto step1d
if %opt3%==Message goto step1d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto step1d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto step1x
if %opt3%==Item goto step1x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto step1x
if %opt3%==t goto step1g
if %opt3%==Tele goto step1g
if %opt3%==TELE goto step1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel3
cls
title Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==Tele goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==TELE goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel1x
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel1f
:step1x
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto step1d

:stepsel2x
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel2d

:stepsel2d
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel2f
:step1d
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto step1f
:step1g
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto step1z
:step1z
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto step1x
:stepsel3d
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel3f
:stepsel3g
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel3z
:stepsel3z
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel3d
:stepsel1g
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel1z
:stepsel1z
cls
title Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel1x
:step1f
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel3f
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel2f
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel1f
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:step1fa
if %nummess% GEQ 2 goto step1fb
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g

:step1fc
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
:step1g
cls
title Command Maker - Finished
echo The command was created and added to commands.txt
echo successfully! Where would you like to go now?
echo.
echo i - Takes you to the Index page.
echo e - Exits out of the Generator.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt5=Option:
if %opt5%==i goto index
if %opt5%==Index goto index
if %opt5%==INDEX goto index
if %opt5%==e goto end
if %opt5%==Exit goto end
if %opt5%==EXIT goto end
if %opt5%==* goto er
goto er
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler code
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:9, topic:162180”][quote author=bugra52 link=topic=220598.msg1910586#msg1910586 date=1196641133]
HOMO COMPILER

this 1 is better

@echo off title FurkanScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
[/quote]

@echo off set path=c:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin javac -cp . *.java pause

Fixed for jdk 6 update 3[/quote]

Ehh i dont care its just better then that 1

No, this one is better.

"C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

item.title: Compiler code
item.dc:creator: @pure_evil072 pure evil072
item.description:
@pure_evil072 wrote:

code:

@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :co1 set b=0 set t=7 goto co2 :co2 color %b%%t% :menu cls title The Perfect Compiler version 1.7 echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To Run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler. echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs. echo. echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto c if %c%==C goto c if %c%==r goto r if %c%==R goto r if %c%==color goto color if %c%==Color goto color if %c%==COLOR goto color if %c%==reset goto reset if %c%==Reset goto reset if %c%==RESET goto reset if %c%==e goto e if %c%==E goto e if %c%==* goto er goto er :color cls echo Would you like to change the backround color, change echo the text color, or reset it to default? echo. echo back - Change the backround color. echo text - Change the text color. echo def - Change all colors back to default. echo. echo. set /p color=Option: if %color%==back goto back if %color%==BACK goto back if %color%==text goto text if %color%==TEXT goto text if %color%==def goto co1 if %color%==DEF goto co1 if %color%==* goto er goto er :back cls echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5) goto co2 :text cls echo Please select a color to change the text to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set t=0) if %back%== white (set t=7) if %back%== red (set t=4) if %back%== yellow (set t=6) if %back%== green (set t=2) if %back%== blue (set t=1) if %back%== purple (set t=5) goto co2 :c cls title Compiler goto cjc :c2 if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3) :c3 if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce) :c4 %javac% -cp . *.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause cls goto menu :c5 %javac% -cp . .\src\*.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause move .\src\*.class .\classes\ cls goto menu :ce cls echo You need to have Java files for this Compiler to Compile. pause cls goto menu :r cls title Runserver goto cj :r2 set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls goto r3 :r3 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4) :r4 if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se) :r5 %rjava% pause cls goto menu :r6 set rjava= set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server %rjava% pause cls goto menu :se cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. pause cls goto menu :er cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :e cls exit :cjc if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2) :cjc2 if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3) :cjc3 if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4) :cjc4 if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5) :cjc5 if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6) :cjc6 if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7) :cjc7 if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8) :cjc8 if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9) :cjc9 if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10) :cjc10 if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11) :cjc11 if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12) :cjc12 if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je) :sjc set javac="%pro%_06%jac%" goto c2 :sjc2 set javac="%pro%_07%jac%" goto c2 :sjc3 set javac="%pro%_08%jac%" goto c2 :sjc4 set javac="%pro%_09%jac%" goto c2 :sjc5 set javac="%pro%_10%jac%" goto c2 :sjc6 set javac="%pro2%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc7 set javac="%pro%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc8 set javac="%pro%_01%jac%" goto c2 :sjc9 set javac="%pro%_02%jac%" goto c2 :sjc10 set javac="%pro%_03%jac%" goto c2 :sjc11 set javac="%pro%_04%jac%" goto c2 :sjc12 set javac="%pro%_05%jac%" goto c2 :cj if exist "%pro%_06%jav%" (goto sj) else (goto cj2) :cj2 if exist "%pro%_07%jav%" (goto sj2) else (goto cj3) :cj3 if exist "%pro%_08%jav%" (goto sj3) else (goto cj4) :cj4 if exist "%pro%_09%jav%" (goto sj4) else (goto cj5) :cj5 if exist "%pro%_10%jav%" (goto sj5) else (goto cj6)
